name: AgentKit
tagline: Agent infrastructure for the Apple ecosystem
description: An agent system for Apple devices supporting long-running tasks like deep research, trip planning, and general productivity. File-based architecture with iCloud storage enables versioning and seamless sync across devices.

targetUsers.positioning: Platform for developers to build agentic apps + consumer-facing agent capabilities

businessModel.valueProposition: Monetize PCC infrastructure, establish Apple OS as 'LLM-first, Agent-first'

techStack.architecture: Swift on both client and server

keyPrinciples: Model-agnostic: Support both local and remote LLM services
Agent-agnostic: Seamless handoff with existing agents (Claude Code, Codex)
File-based: Everything stored and versioned in iCloud
Developer-friendly: Layered building blocks on AppIntents + MCP
